title: Lunchbox Buys Inappropriate Gift For His Mom + Is Bobby Buying Raymundo’s Engagement Ring For Bae?
itunes:title: Lunchbox Buys Inappropriate Gift For His Mom + Is Bobby Buying Raymundo’s Engagement Ring For Bae?
description:
Lunchbox goes to department stores with a hidden mic to buy an inappropriate gift for his mom ahead of Mother’s Day. Rodney Atkins stops by for the Friday Morning Conversation. Raymundo talks about his engagement ring fund for Bae. Also, a listener shares why she thinks Bobby has Asperger’s. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
